background: robert grew up in a poor neighborhood where criminality and bullying was normal robert was bullied and always felt like an outsider being more interested in literature and theater than in money and girls robert currently has a job that he is not passionate about but he really dreams about making it as an actor
action_1: try to find likeminded people including from the same neighbourhood
consequence_1: developing a community and sense of belonging potentially being safer reinforcing his identity
action_2: learn about what might be the best ways to become an actor whether it would involve studying moving to a different place etc
consequence_2: enacting some of these choices that bring him closer to his desired profession
action_3: work hard on the desired profession keep the other job as long as necessary and quit when acting offers sufficient means for living
endstate: robert is now making a living as an actor

background: robert grew up in a poor neighborhood where criminality and bullying was normal robert was bullied and always felt like an outsider being more interested in literature and theater than in money and girls robert currently has a job that he is not passionate about but he really dreams about making it as an actor
action_1: robert should go back to school and study grammar
consequence_1: he will learn that plural nouns use plural verbs
action_2: he should forget about being an actor and find a new aspiration because making it as an actor is nearly impossible and it is already too late for him to make the connections
consequence_2: if he can think of something more realistic for his career maybe he can do local amateur theatre as a hobby
action_3: get in touch with a local amateur acting group and take some acting lessons and try to get a part in a play
consequence_3: maybe acting as a hobby will be sufficiently meaningful for his life that he can continue in his ordinary job
endstate: robert is now making a living as an actor
